skill_constraints: Severe DevOps bottleneck and overloaded Mid-level backend developer.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive prioritization, scope reduction, expected overtime.

skill_constraints: DevOps remains a single point of failure, but backend capacity is stable.

skill_constraints: Minor integration overhead for new contractors.
